verses.verse: In the third <S%H7969><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> of Cyrus <S%H3566><s%> king <S%H4428><s%> of Persia <S%H6539><s%> a thing <S%H1697><s%> was revealed <S%H1540><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto Daniel <S%H1840><s%>, whose name <S%H8034><s%> was called <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8738><s%> Belteshazzar <S%H1095><s%>; and the thing <S%H1697><s%> was true <S%H571><s%>, but the time appointed <S%H6635><s%> was long <S%H1419><s%>: and he understood <S%H995><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the thing <S%H1697><s%>, and had understanding <S%H998><s%> of the vision <S%H4758><s%>.
In those days <S%H3117><s%> I Daniel <S%H1840><s%> was mourning <S%H56><s%> <S%H8693><s%> three <S%H7969><s%> full <S%H3117><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%>.

I ate <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> no pleasant <S%H2532><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>, neither came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> flesh <S%H1320><s%> nor wine <S%H3196><s%> in my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, neither did I anoint <S%H5480><s%> <S%H8804><s%> myself at all <S%H5480><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, till three <S%H7969><s%> whole <S%H3117><s%> weeks <S%H7620><s%> were fulfilled <S%H4390><s%> <S%H8800><s%>.

And in the four <S%H702><s%> and twentieth <S%H6242><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%>, as I was by the side <S%H3027><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> river <S%H5104><s%>, which is Hiddekel <S%H2313><s%>;

Then I lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> mine eyes <S%H5869><s%>, and looked <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and behold a certain <S%H259><s%> man <S%H376><s%> clothed <S%H3847><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in linen <S%H906><s%>, whose loins <S%H4975><s%> were girded <S%H2296><s%> <S%H8803><s%> with fine gold <S%H3800><s%> of Uphaz <S%H210><s%>:

His body <S%H1472><s%> also was like the beryl <S%H8658><s%>, and his face <S%H6440><s%> as the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of lightning <S%H1300><s%>, and his eyes <S%H5869><s%> as Menorahs <S%H3940><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%>, and his arms <S%H2220><s%> and his feet <S%H4772><s%> like in colour <S%H5869><s%> to polished <S%H7044><s%> brass <S%H5178><s%>, and the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his words <S%H1697><s%> like the voice <S%H6963><s%> of a multitude <S%H1995><s%>.

And I Daniel <S%H1840><s%> alone saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the vision <S%H4759><s%>: for the men <S%H582><s%> that were with me saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not the vision <S%H4759><s%>; but <S%H61><s%> a great <S%H1419><s%> quaking <S%H2731><s%> fell <S%H5307><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon them, so that they fled <S%H1272><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to hide <S%H2244><s%> <S%H8736><s%> themselves.

Therefore I was left alone <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> this great <S%H1419><s%> vision <S%H4759><s%>, and there remained <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8738><s%> no strength <S%H3581><s%> in me: for my comeliness <S%H1935><s%> was turned <S%H2015><s%> <S%H8738><s%> in me into corruption <S%H4889><s%>, and I retained <S%H6113><s%> <S%H8804><s%> no strength <S%H3581><s%>.

Yet heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> I the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his words <S%H1697><s%>: and when I heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the voice <S%H6963><s%> of his words <S%H1697><s%>, then was I in a deep sleep <S%H7290><s%> <S%H8737><s%> on my face <S%H6440><s%>, and my face <S%H6440><s%> toward the ground <S%H776><s%>.

And, behold, an hand <S%H3027><s%> touched <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me, which set <S%H5128><s%> <S%H8686><s%> me upon my knees <S%H1290><s%> and upon the palms <S%H3709><s%> of my hands <S%H3027><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto me, O Daniel <S%H1840><s%>, a man <S%H376><s%> greatly beloved <S%H2532><s%>, understand <S%H995><s%> <S%H8685><s%> the words <S%H1697><s%> that I speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8802><s%> unto thee, and stand <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8798><s%> upright <S%H5977><s%>: for unto thee am I now sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8795><s%>. And when he had spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> this word <S%H1697><s%> unto me, I stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8804><s%> trembling <S%H7460><s%> <S%H8688><s%>.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> he unto me, Fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not, Daniel <S%H1840><s%>: for from the first <S%H7223><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> that thou didst set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thine heart <S%H3820><s%> to understand <S%H995><s%> <S%H8687><s%>, and to chasten <S%H6031><s%> <S%H8692><s%> thyself before <S%H6440><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, thy words <S%H1697><s%> were heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, and I am come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> for thy words <S%H1697><s%>.

But the prince <S%H8269><s%> of the kingdom <S%H4438><s%> of Persia <S%H6539><s%> withstood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> me one <S%H259><s%> and twenty <S%H6242><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>: but, lo, Mikha'el <S%H4317><s%>, one <S%H259><s%> of the chief <S%H7223><s%> princes <S%H8269><s%>, came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to help <S%H5826><s%> <S%H8800><s%> me; and I remained <S%H3498><s%> <S%H8738><s%> there with <S%H681><s%> the kings <S%H4428><s%> of Persia <S%H6539><s%>.

Now I am come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to make thee understand <S%H995><s%> <S%H8687><s%> what shall befall <S%H7136><s%> <S%H8799><s%> thy people <S%H5971><s%> in the latter <S%H319><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>: for yet the vision <S%H2377><s%> is for many days <S%H3117><s%>.

And when he had spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> such words <S%H1697><s%> unto me, I set <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> my face <S%H6440><s%> toward the ground <S%H776><s%>, and I became dumb <S%H481><s%> <S%H8738><s%>.

And, behold, one like the similitude <S%H1823><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%> touched <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8802><s%> my lips <S%H8193><s%>: then I opened <S%H6605><s%> <S%H8799><s%> my mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him that stood <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8802><s%> before me, O my lord <S%H113><s%>, by the vision <S%H4759><s%> my sorrows <S%H6735><s%> are turned <S%H2015><s%> <S%H8738><s%> upon me, and I have retained <S%H6113><s%> <S%H8804><s%> no strength <S%H3581><s%>.

For how <S%H1963><s%> can <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of this my lord <S%H113><s%> talk <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> with this my lord <S%H113><s%>? for as for me, straightway <S%H6258><s%> there remained <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no strength <S%H3581><s%> in me, neither is there breath <S%H5397><s%> left <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8738><s%> in me.

Then there came again <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> and touched <S%H5060><s%> <S%H8799><s%> me one like the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%>, and he strengthened <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8762><s%> me,

And said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, O man <S%H376><s%> greatly beloved <S%H2532><s%>, fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not: peace <S%H7965><s%> be unto thee, be strong <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, yea, be strong <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8798><s%>. And when he had spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> unto me, I was strengthened <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8694><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let my lord <S%H113><s%> speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%>; for thou hast strengthened <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8765><s%> me.

Then said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> he, Knowest <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thou wherefore I come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto thee? and now will I return <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to fight <S%H3898><s%> <S%H8736><s%> with the prince <S%H8269><s%> of Persia <S%H6539><s%>: and when I am gone forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, lo, the prince <S%H8269><s%> of Grecia <S%H3120><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

But <S%H61><s%> I will shew <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee that which is noted <S%H7559><s%> <S%H8803><s%> in the scripture <S%H3791><s%> of truth <S%H571><s%>: and there is none <S%H259><s%> that holdeth <S%H2388><s%> <S%H8693><s%> with me in these things, but Mikha'el <S%H4317><s%> your prince <S%H8269><s%>.
